resources.string: You have to earn coins by rolling the die, get 5 coins on each roll of a six.
You can go to the "Two or more" page by Clicking on\n and gamble the earned coins by using further rules.
Make sure to wage amount so that balance doesn\'t reach negative.
There are 3 modes: 2 alike, 3 alike and 4 alike.\nIn 2 alike mode, rewards are given if 2 dices have the same\nvalue.Similar rule applies to 3 alike and 4 alike.
The amount won or deducted is the waged value\nmultiplied by the number of dices alike in the given mode.
You can earn coins in the starting page of the app by tapping on the\ndie button and earning coins whenever you get a six on the die.
You can go to the "Two or more" page by tapping on the button of the\nsame name and earn more coins by waging coins.
The amount to be waged must be within balance in such a manner that if you\nlose, the amount to be deducted must be lesser than the current balance.
There are 3 modes: 2 alike, 3 alike and 4 alike. In 2 alike mode, rewards\nare given if 2 dices have the same value.Similar rule applies to 3 alike and 4 alike.
The amount won or deducted is the waged value multiplied by the number\nof dices alike in the given mode.
